module.name: avm-res-maintenance-maintenanceconfiguration
module.description: Terraform Azure Verified Resource Module for Maintenance Configuration

inputs.name: install_patches
role_assignments
inputs.type:
map(object({
    role_definition_id_or_name             = string
    principal_id                           = string
    description                            = optional(string, null)
    skip_service_principal_aad_check       = optional(bool, false)
    condition                              = optional(string, null)
    condition_version                      = optional(string, null)
    delegated_managed_identity_resource_id = optional(string, null)
    principal_type                         = optional(string, null)
  }))

inputs.name: window
inputs.type:
object({
    duration             = optional(string, "01:30")
    expiration_date_time = optional(string)
    recur_every          = string
    start_date_time      = string
    time_zone            = string
  })

inputs.name: lock

outputs.name: name
outputs.description: The name of the Maintenance Configuration resource.

outputs.name: resource_id
outputs.description: The ID of the Maintenance Configuration resource.
